column2: Númenórean]] and a descendant of the [[House of Hador]]. He was a close friend of King [[Tar-Meneldur]]. He had a son named [[Orchaldor]] who married Tar-Meneldur's oldest daughter, [[Ailinel]].<ref>{{UT

column1: Hatholdir's name is [[Sindarin]] and seems to mean "Man of the Axe-blade" (from ''[[hathol]]'', 'axe-blade', and the masculine suffix ''[[-dir]]'').
